select md_id, md_name, md_oneline, md_price, md_category, md_abv, md_discount , truncate( md_price - (md_price / 100 * md_discount), 0 ) sale_price , md_content, md_thumbnail_name, md_thumbnail_path, md_detail_name, md_detail_path, md_content, md_standard_stock, md_sales_rate, md_stock , md_sweet, md_sour, md_sparkling, md_use, md_ratingAvg, md_onsale from md
where md_category = #{md_category} and md_onsale = "Y"
where md_sweet = #{md_sweet} and md_onsale = "Y"
where md_sour = #{md_sour} and md_onsale = "Y"
where md_sparkling = #{md_sparkling} and md_onsale = "Y"
where md_use = #{md_use} and md_onsale = "Y"
order by md_id desc limit #{limitNum}, 4
select count(md_id) cnt from md where md_category = #{md_category} and md_onsale = "Y"

select md_id, md_name, md_oneline, md_price, md_category, md_abv, md_discount , truncate( md_price - (md_price / 100 * md_discount), 0 ) sale_price , md_content, md_thumbnail_name, md_thumbnail_path, md_detail_name, md_detail_path, md_content, md_standard_stock, md_sales_rate, md_stock , md_sweet, md_sour, md_sparkling, md_use, #{md_ratingAvg} from md
where md_name like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') and md_onsale = "Y"

select count(md_id) cnt from md
where md_name like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') and md_onsale = "Y"
